mlneuro.utils.io¶

mlneuro.utils.io.load_array_dict(filename, read_type=None)[source]¶

Load a dictionary of arrays from disk in multiple formats inferred from the file extension.

mlneuro.utils.io.recursive_subdirectories(head_dir, leaves_only=False, return_head=False)[source]¶

Lazily and recursively yields subdirectories

mlneuro.utils.io.save_array_dict(filename, dict_of_arrs, save_type='h5')[source]¶

Save a dictionary of arrays to disk in one of many types

mlneuro.utils.io.save_dict_hdf5(file_name, dict, mode='w')[source]¶

Save a dictionary of arrays in the hdf5 format. Each key specifies a dataset name. mode can specify appending or writing.

mlneuro.utils.io.subdirectories(d)[source]¶

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/800197/how-to-get-all-of-the-immediate-subdirectories-in-python
